verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> You and your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> with you shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the sanctuary: <S%H4720><s%> and you and your sons <S%H1121><s%> with you shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of your priesthood. <S%H3550><s%>

And your brothers <S%H251><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> bring <S%H7126><s%> you with you, that they may be joined <S%H3867><s%> to you, and minister <S%H8334><s%> to you: but you and your sons <S%H1121><s%> with you shall minister before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of witness. <S%H5715><s%>

And they shall keep <S%H8104><s%> your charge, <S%H4931><s%> and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the tabernacle: <S%H168><s%> only <S%H389><s%> they shall not come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> that neither <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1571><s%> they, nor you also, <S%H1571><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>

And they shall be joined <S%H3867><s%> to you, and keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle: <S%H168><s%> and a stranger <S%H376><s%> <S%H2114><s%> shall not come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to you.

And you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%> that there be no <S%H3808><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> on the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And I, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have taken <S%H3947><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> to you they are given <S%H5414><s%> as a gift <S%H4979><s%> for the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

Therefore you and your sons <S%H1121><s%> with you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> your priest's <S%H3550><s%> office for everything <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and within <S%H1004><s%> the veil; <S%H6532><s%> and you shall serve: <S%H5647><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> your priest's <S%H3550><s%> office to you as a service <S%H5656><s%> of gift: <S%H4979><s%> and the stranger <S%H376><s%> <S%H2114><s%> that comes <S%H7131><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> shall be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I also have given <S%H5414><s%> you the charge <S%H4931><s%> of my heave <S%H8641><s%> offerings <S%H8641><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the hallowed <S%H6944><s%> things of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> to you have I given <S%H5414><s%> them by reason of the anointing, <S%H4888><s%> and to your sons, <S%H1121><s%> by an ordinance <S%H2706><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> shall be your of the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> things, reserved from the fire: <S%H784><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> oblation <S%H7133><s%> of theirs, every <S%H3605><s%> meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of theirs, and every <S%H3605><s%> sin <S%H2403><s%> offering of theirs, and every <S%H3605><s%> trespass <S%H817><s%> offering of theirs which <S%H834><s%> they shall render <S%H7725><s%> to me, shall be most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> for you and for your sons. <S%H1121><s%>
In the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place shall you eat <S%H398><s%> it; every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> it: it shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> to you.

And this <S%H2088><s%> is yours; the heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> of their gift, <S%H4976><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the wave <S%H8573><s%> offerings of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> them to you, and to your sons <S%H1121><s%> and to your daughters <S%H1323><s%> with you, by a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever: <S%H5769><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one that is clean <S%H2889><s%> in your house <S%H1004><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> of it.

All <S%H3605><s%> the best <S%H2459><s%> of the oil, <S%H8081><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the best <S%H2459><s%> of the wine, <S%H8492><s%> and of the wheat, <S%H1715><s%> the first fruits <S%H7225><s%> of them which <S%H834><s%> they shall offer <S%H5414><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> them have I given <S%H5414><s%> you.

And whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> is first <S%H1061><s%> ripe <S%H1061><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they shall bring <S%H935><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> shall be yours; every <S%H3605><s%> one that is clean <S%H2889><s%> in your house <S%H1004><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> of it.
Every thing <S%H3605><s%> devoted <S%H2764><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be yours.

Every <S%H3605><s%> thing that opens <S%H6363><s%> the matrix <S%H7358><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they bring <S%H7126><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> whether it be of men <S%H120><s%> or <S%H176><s%> beasts, <S%H929><s%> shall be yours: nevertheless <S%H389><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> shall you surely redeem, <S%H6299><s%> and the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> beasts <S%H929><s%> shall you redeem. <S%H6299><s%>

And those that are to be redeemed <S%H6299><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shall you redeem, <S%H6299><s%> according to your estimation, <S%H6187><s%> for the money <S%H3701><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> which <S%H1958><s%> is twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs. <S%H1626><s%>

But the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a cow, <S%H7794><s%> or the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a sheep, <S%H3775><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a goat, <S%H5795><s%> you shall not redeem; <S%H6299><s%> they are holy: <S%H6944><s%> you shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and shall burn <S%H6999><s%> their fat <S%H2459><s%> for an offering made by fire, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of them shall be yours, as the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and as the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> are yours.

All <S%H3605><s%> the heave <S%H8641><s%> offerings <S%H8641><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> things, which <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> offer <S%H7311><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> you, and your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> with you, by a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever: <S%H5769><s%> it is a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of salt <S%H4417><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to you and to your seed <S%H2233><s%> with you.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> You shall have no <S%H3808><s%> inheritance <S%H5157><s%> in their land, <S%H776><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you have <S%H1961><s%> any part <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them: I am your part <S%H2506><s%> and your inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the tenth <S%H4643><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> for their service <S%H5656><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they serve, <S%H5647><s%> even the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> must the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from now on <S%H5750><s%> come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> lest they bear <S%H5375><s%> sin, <S%H2399><s%> and die. <S%H4191><s%>

But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%> it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations, <S%H1755><s%> that among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> they have no <S%H3808><s%> inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

But the tithes <S%H4643><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they offer <S%H7311><s%> as an heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> to inherit: <S%H5159><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have said <S%H559><s%> to them, Among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> they shall have no <S%H3808><s%> inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus speak <S%H1696><s%> to the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, When <S%H3588><s%> you take <S%H3947><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the tithes <S%H4643><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you from them for your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> then you shall offer <S%H7311><s%> up an heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> of it for the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even a tenth <S%H4643><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> of the tithe. <S%H4643><s%>

And this your heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> shall be reckoned <S%H2803><s%> to you, as though it were the corn <S%H1715><s%> of the threshing floor, <S%H1637><s%> and as the fullness <S%H4395><s%> of the wine press. <S%H3342><s%>

Thus <S%H3651><s%> you also <S%H1571><s%> shall offer <S%H7311><s%> an heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your tithes, <S%H4643><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you receive <S%H3947><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and you shall give <S%H5414><s%> thereof the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

Out of all <S%H3605><s%> your gifts <S%H4979><s%> you shall offer <S%H7311><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the best <S%H2459><s%> thereof, even <S%H853><s%> the hallowed <S%H4720><s%> part thereof out of it.

Therefore you shall say <S%H559><s%> to them, When you have heaved <S%H7311><s%> the best <S%H2459><s%> thereof from it, then it shall be counted <S%H2803><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> as the increase <S%H8393><s%> of the threshing floor, <S%H1637><s%> and as the increase <S%H8393><s%> of the wine press. <S%H3342><s%>

And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in every <S%H3605><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> you and your households: <S%H1004><s%> for it is your reward <S%H7939><s%> for your service <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And you shall bear <S%H5375><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sin <S%H2399><s%> by reason <S%H5921><s%> of it, when you have heaved <S%H7311><s%> from it the best <S%H2459><s%> of it: neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you pollute <S%H2490><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> things of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> you die. <S%H4191><s%>
